item.title: 华尔街追逐人工智能数十亿美元，而非洲正试图加入这场竞赛
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，Loni Prinsloo 和 Yinka Ibukun 报道非洲为加入人工智能竞赛所做的蓬勃努力。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Loni Prinsloo and Yinka Ibukun report on the burgeoning effort by Africa to join the AI race.】

item.title: 人工智能、政府债务与环境、社会和公司治理：审视各种资产的泡沫风险
item.description: 在今年的新经济论坛上，演讲者对三重泡沫提出了警告【原文：Speakers at this year’s New Economy Forum warned about a trio of bubbles】

item.title: 股市暴跌，国债将创数周最大涨幅
item.description: 由于避险需求压倒了对美联储下月是否降息的疑虑，美国国债有望锁定本周涨幅。【原文：US Treasuries are poised to lock in weekly gains as haven demand trumps doubts over whether the Federal Reserve will deliver an interest rate cut next month.】

item.title: 德国在中国敞开大门却一无所获
item.description: 拉尔斯-克林拜尔试图重塑德国与中国的关系，但这只能说明欧洲最大的经济体在与亚洲对手交往时的软弱无力。【原文：Lars Klingbeil’s attempt to reset German ties with China has done little more than showcase the weakness of Europe’s biggest economy in engaging with its Asian counterpart.】

item.title: 投资者的焦虑远不止人工智能和英伟达
item.description:
对经济和信贷市场的担忧支撑着投资者情绪的转变。【原文：

Worries about economy, credit markets are underpinning the shift in investor sentiment.

】

item.title: 美巢希望 12 月在印度上市，估值达 60 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度电子商务平台 Meesho Ltd. 计划于 12 月上半月启动首次公开募股，该公司正在寻求约 5300 亿卢比（约合 60 亿美元）的估值。【原文：Indian e-commerce platform Meesho Ltd., which plans to launch its initial public offering in the first half of December, is seeking a valuation of about 530 billion rupees ($6 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟就破坏 BPM 银行交易的权力向意大利发出警告
item.description: 欧盟就意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）为阻止其对 Banco BPM SpA 的收购而使用的所谓 "黄金权力"（Golden Powers）向意大利发出警告，从而加剧了布鲁塞尔与罗马之间在该集团推动银行业整合过程中的权力斗争。【原文：The European Union fired a warning shot to Italy over so-called Golden Powers used to thwart UniCredit SpA’s aborted takeover of Banco BPM SpA, ramping up a power struggle between Brussels and Rome amid the bloc’s push for banking consolidation.】

item.title: 堡垒公司押注日益增长的德国和法国违约贷款市场
item.description: Fortress 投资集团正寻求在德国和法国等该地区的一些核心经济体扩大其欧洲不良贷款业务，因为该集团认为这些国家的一些房地产借款人正面临越来越大的压力。【原文：Fortress Investment Group is looking to expand its European non-performing loan business in some of the region’s core economies, including Germany and France, where it sees some real estate borrowers coming under increasing strain.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利与 OpenAI 的合作显示银行如何吸引热门初创企业
item.description: 当摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的一个团队邀请山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）到门洛帕克办公室与该银行的一些高管会面时，几乎没有科技行业以外的人听说过 ChatGPT 这个词。【原文：Almost no one outside the tech industry had heard the term ChatGPT when a team at Morgan Stanley invited Sam Altman to its Menlo Park office to meet with some of the bank’s executives.】

item.title: 布拉德斯科股价飙升，超越竞争对手，首席执行官扭亏为盈
item.description: 马塞洛-诺罗尼亚（Marcelo Noronha）接手布雷德斯科银行（Banco Bradesco SA）两年后，带领该银行扭亏为盈，使其股价今年上涨了 64%，表现优于巴西其他主要零售银行。【原文：Two years after taking over at Banco Bradesco SA, Marcelo Noronha is leading a turnaround that’s sent the bank’s shares up 64% this year, outperforming every other major Brazilian retail bank.】

item.title: Meta 进入电力交易领域以支持其人工智能能源需求
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司正在涉足复杂的电力交易领域，打赌它能加快美国新发电厂的建设，这对其人工智能雄心至关重要。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is venturing into the complex world of electricity trading, betting it can accelerate the construction of new US power plants that are vital to its artificial intelligence ambitions.】

item.title: 如果中国升级，日本将向美国盟友寻求支持
item.description: 如果中国的经济压力升级，日本很可能会更加倚重美国及其盟国，因为东京正努力应对首相佐那江隆一将台湾安全与自身安全挂钩的言论所带来的影响。【原文：Japan will likely lean more heavily on the US and its allies if China escalates economic pressure, as Tokyo seeks to navigate the fallout from Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s remarks linking Taiwan’s security to its own.】

item.title: 德国央行称欧盟可能汇集私人信贷数据以把握风险
item.description: 据德国央行称，欧洲监管机构正在讨论共享私人信贷公司的数据，以便更好地了解这一蓬勃发展的资产类别所带来的整体风险。【原文：European regulators are discussing sharing data on private credit firms to get a better picture of overall risks from the booming asset class, according to Germany’s central bank.】

item.title: 印度战斗机在迪拜航展飞行表演中坠毁
item.description: 据美联社报道，周五下午，一架印度制造的 Tejas 战斗机在迪拜航展的飞行表演中坠毁。【原文：An Indian-made Tejas fighter jet crashed during a flight demonstration at the Dubai Airshow on Friday afternoon, the Associated Press reported.】

item.title: 关税冲击以来最疯狂的交易日，考验低迷买家的神经
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的爆炸性预测本应使跌势买家回心转意。然而，科技股的溃败和喜忧参半的就业报告却让投资者遍体鳞伤，他们只能选择养伤或蹚浑水。【原文：A blowout forecast from Nvidia Corp. was supposed to bring back dip buyers. Instead, a tech rout and a mixed jobs report left investors battered and with a choice of nursing their wounds or wading back.】

item.title: 创新生物加入香港股票基准指数
item.description: 恒生指数公司（Hang Seng Indexes Co.【原文：Hang Seng Indexes Co. added biopharmaceutical company Innovent Biologics Inc. to its Hong Kong stock benchmark, the index compiler said following its quarterly review.】

item.title: 大科技公司的债务狂潮提高了争创人工智能世界的风险
item.description: 华尔街越来越担心大科技公司为建立人工智能基础设施所承担的杠杆作用，因为该行业面临的泡沫担忧日益加剧。【原文：Wall Street is growing increasingly concerned about the amount of leverage that Big Tech is taking on to build out its artificial intelligence infrastructure as the industry faces rising fears of a bubble.】

item.title: 欧元区薪资增速下降，支持欧洲央行放宽物价政策
item.description: 衡量欧元区薪资增长的一个关键指标有所放缓，支持了欧洲中央银行关于粘性服务通胀将放缓的预期。【原文：A key measure of euro-area pay growth eased, supporting the European Central Bank’s expectation that sticky services inflation will moderate.】

item.title: Permabull Tom Lee 预计 1 月底比特币将升至 20 万美元
item.description:
这位一向乐观的 Fundstrat Global Advisors 联合创始人相信散户投资者的长期力量。【原文：

The always optimistic co-founder of Fundstrat Global Advisors believes in the long-term power of retail investors. 

】

item.title: 数据中心的繁荣为何如此重要
item.description:
为了追求人工智能的革命性进步，科技公司正投入数十亿美元建设大规模的新设施。这些项目正在给电网、环境资源，甚至金融市场造成巨大压力

。【原文：

In pursuit of revolutionary advances in AI, tech companies are plowing billions of dollars into massive new facilities. The projects are straining power grids, environmental resources and, potentially, financial markets

】

item.title: 做空者加大对吉姆-拉特克利夫的英力士公司的债券押注
item.description: 随着亿万富翁吉姆-拉特克利夫（Jim Ratcliffe）拥有的这家化工巨头被卷入对该行业的更广泛担忧，卖空者开始瞄准英力士公司（Ineos）发行的债务。【原文：Short sellers have begun targeting debt issued by Ineos, as the chemicals giant owned by billionaire Jim Ratcliffe gets pulled into broader concerns about the sector.】

item.title: 台积电首席执行官获芯片业最高奖后承诺在美国大力发展
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s boss vowed to keep growing its US presence to meet AI demand, sustaining a rapid expansion that also encompasses Japan and Europe.】

item.title: 日本 "探月计划 "芯片公司 Rapidus 计划在 2031 年左右上市
item.description: 日本国家支持的芯片合资企业 Rapidus Corp. 计划在 2031 财年左右上市，以增强日本国内的芯片制造能力。【原文：Japan’s state-backed chip venture Rapidus Corp. aims to go public around fiscal 2031 in a bid to bolster the country’s domestic chipmaking capabilities.】

item.title: 英国采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，英国私营部门在预算案公布前增长乏力
item.description: 一项著名的调查显示，在工党政府即将公布预算的前几周，英国企业几乎没有取得任何增长，企业士气似乎因税收增加的前景而受到打击。【原文：UK businesses recorded hardly any growth in the weeks ahead of the Labour government’s upcoming budget, according to a prominent survey, with morale appearing to be dented by the prospect of rising taxes.】

item.title: 印度卢比跌至新低，因印度央行退出防务
item.description: 印度卢比兑美元汇率创下历史新低，因为交易商称印度储备银行不再抛售绿卡，以坚定地支持印度卢比。【原文：The Indian rupee hit a fresh all-time low against the dollar, as traders said the Reserve Bank of India stepped away from selling the greenback to firmly support the currency.】

item.title: 私募股权投资公司 EQT 同意从 Blackstone 收购 Desotec
item.description: EQT AB 同意从 Blackstone Inc. 收购欧洲环境服务公司 Desotec 的多数股权，这是该公司将业务出售给美国私募股权投资公司四年后的事。【原文：EQT AB agreed to acquire a majority stake in European environmental service company Desotec from Blackstone Inc., four years after it sold the business to the US private equity firm.】

item.title: 法国媒体公司 Canal+ 就首次发行的债券与投资者洽谈
item.description: 法国媒体集团 Canal+ SA 正在为其首次欧元债券销售做准备，并将于下周开始与投资者洽谈。【原文：French media group Canal+ SA is gearing up for its debut euro bond sale and will start talking investors ahead of the deal next week.】

item.title: S&P 拒绝非洲评级偏差的说法：没有区别对待
item.description: S&P全球评级公司反驳了关于在评估非洲国家政府信用时存在偏见的说法，称所有非洲国家政府都受到平等对待。【原文：S&P Global Ratings pushed back against claims of bias in assessing the creditworthiness of African governments, saying all receive equal treatment.】

item.title: 欧元区商业活动因服务业强劲而保持稳健
item.description: 11 月份，欧元区私营部门活动保持强劲，为今年最后几个月经济增长回升带来了希望。【原文：Private-sector activity in the euro area stayed strong in November, feeding hopes that economic growth can pick up in the last months of the year.】

item.title: 图洛石油公司上调净债务展望后跌至历史新低
item.description: 图洛石油公司（Tullow Oil Plc）在与债权人就各种方案举行会谈时上调了净债务预期，该公司股价跌至历史新低，伦敦股市短暂停盘。【原文：Tullow Oil Plc sank to a record low, with trading of the shares briefly halted in London, after the company raised its net debt forecast as it holds talks with creditors over various options.】
